translations: adv.仪式上地；依据仪式上地

phrs.translation: 依据仪式上地, 仪式上地

sentences.sentence: Perhaps it had been "ritually killed" at the end of its life, like other Bronze-Age objects.
sentences.translation: 也许像其他青铜时代的物品一样，它在生命结束时被“仪式性地杀死”了。

sentences.sentence: I ritually write a column summarizing the new theories of each of my years.
sentences.translation: 我虔诚的写下了这篇专栏文章，包含了我大学生活每一年所得出的新鲜结论。
